events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago and the delivery still hasn't arrived; the tracking status hasn't updated in several days.
The customer's issue is identified as a delivery delay related to an unupdated tracking status and late shipment.
Agent Mark has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case and contact the customer.
Hello, this is Mark from support. I understand your shipment is delayed and I'd like to help resolve this promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code you have received so I can check the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and the tracking number is ZX987654321. The tracking page shows no updates for 5 days now.
I contacted the shipping company and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. We aim to expedite your delivery and will update you shortly.
Thanks for the update. I hope it arrives soon as I need the laptop for an important project next week.
Your package has been delivered today. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the delay and thank you for your patience.
We are following up to ensure your laptop has arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delayed delivery.
The delivery delay case has been closed after confirmation from customer that the laptop arrived and meets their expectations.
